postCreateCommand:
for script in /workspace/scripts/*.sh; do \
    if [ -f "$script" ]; then \
      script_name=$(basename "$script" .sh); \
      echo "alias $script_name='bash $script'" >> ~/.bash_aliases; \
    fi; \
  done && echo "if [ -f ~/.bash_aliases ]; then . ~/.bash_aliases; fi" >> ~/.bashrc
